title: How to Cook Asian Style Chicken Noodle Soup

steps.headline: Prepare the oil by heating it in the large soup pot over a high heat.
Mix the garlic, pepper, and sliced onion to the pot and stir for 2 minutes.
Carefully pour the chicken stock and add the shredded carrots in the pot and stir thoroughly.
Place a lid on the pot and bring it up to a slow boil.
Wait until it boils and then add the chicken.
steps.description: Lower the heat and let the food simmer for 5 minutes.

steps.headline: Add the noodles to the pot and continue to let it simmer for another 5 minutes.
Remove the pot from the heat.
steps.description: Squirt the lime juice in the soup and serve into soup bowls.

steps.headline: Garnish each bowl with coriander, a basil leaf, and a bit of bean sprouts.

text: Prepare the oil by heating it in the large soup pot over a high heat.  Mix the garlic, pepper, and sliced onion to the pot and stir for 2 minutes. Season the mixture if necessary. Carefully pour the chicken stock and add the shredded carrots in the pot and stir thoroughly.  Place a lid on the pot and bring it up to a slow boil.  Wait until it boils and then add the chicken. Lower the heat and let the food simmer for 5 minutes. Add the noodles to the pot and continue to let it simmer for another 5 minutes.  Remove the pot from the heat. Squirt the lime juice in the soup and serve into soup bowls. Garnish each bowl with coriander, a basil leaf, and a bit of bean sprouts.  Finished.
